greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest difference > 1 between d and n/d for any divisor d of n.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..10000
program: (PARI) for(n=3, 100, v=divisors(n); r=sqrt(n); t=0; for(k=1, length(v), if(v[k]>=r, t=k; break)); if(v[t]^2==n, u=t, u=t-1); if(v[t]-v[u]<2, u=u-1; t=t+1); print1(v[t]-v[u]", "))
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 04 2003
